meanings: (한 번에 가볍게 뛰거나 날아오르는 모양) lightly

vlive.korean: 어디론가 훌쩍 떠나고 싶은? Made me want to take a trip somewhere? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 💚HAPPY SAN DAY D-1💚
vlive.english: Made me want to take a trip somewhere?

vlive.korean: 집에서도 어디론가 훌쩍 떠나면 이게 또... When we leave our homes to other places.. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Jeong Eun Ji X CouchTalk - 정은지 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: When we leave our homes to other places..

vlive.korean: [코 훌쩍...] 너무 새드 스토리다... It's very sad story. 듣기 View video Hyomstore : ep.16 바쁘다 바빠 효민본부장! 달려라 달려 횸스토어 MD들!
그래도 벌써 1시간이 훌쩍 지나가 버렸는데요 - 진짜? But we've already passed over an hour. - Really? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: But we've already passed over an hour. - Really?

vlive.korean: [훌쩍] [너 정말 나쁜 아이구나...?] 너 써? [You are a bastard] You want to? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [You are a bastard] You want to?

examples.korean: She swung herself over the gate in one smooth movement. 발음듣기 그녀는 부드럽게 훌쩍 그 문을 뛰어넘었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She swung herself over the gate in one smooth movement. 발음

examples.korean: She’s like a butterfly. She flits in and out of people’s lives. 발음듣기 그녀는 나비와 같다. 사람들 삶 속으로 훌쩍 날아 들어왔다 날아가 버린다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She’s like a butterfly. She flits in and out of people’s lives. 발음

examples.korean: He hopped[jumped lightly] over the fence. 발음듣기 그는 울타리를 훌쩍 뛰어넘었다 Neungyule
examples.english: He hopped[jumped lightly] over the fence. 발음

examples.korean: She suddenly left for England one day. 발음듣기 그녀는 어느 날 영국으로 훌쩍 떠났다 Neungyule
examples.english: She suddenly left for England one day. 발음

examples.korean: He often goes on impromptu trips. 발음듣기 그는 종종 훌쩍 여행을 떠난다 Neungyule
examples.english: He often goes on impromptu trips. 발음
